verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thanks be to God, who leads us into triumph!
Thanks be to God, whose got the victory. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
By the blood of our Savior,
We are set free from the curse.
Jesus is the one and only lasting sacrifice.
He has broken Satan's power,
No more shall we be the same.
Just as he defeated death,
We shall do the same!
Oh, we shall do the same.
